description: Dashboard for displaying basic host metrics collected by telegraf and stored into the InfluxDB 2.0. Metrics are fetched by flux.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "PLC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Part"] == "PLC_Utility")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "CpuIdle")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: 100 - r._value})) 
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "PLC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Part"] == "PLC_Utility")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "CpuClass3" or r["_field"] == "CpuClass1" or r["_field"] == "CpuControl" or r["_field"] == "CpuControlMotion")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "PLC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Part"] == "PLC_Utility")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "TaskAlarmEmulate" or r["_field"] == "TaskMotion" or r["_field"] == "TaskNew")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")  
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement","_start","_stop","_time","host","Part"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "PLC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Part"] == "PLC_Utility")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "CpuClass3" or r["_field"] == "CpuClass1" or r["_field"] == "CpuControl" or r["_field"] == "CpuControlMotion")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: 系统任务CPU使用率历史记录

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "PLC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Part"] == "PLC_Utility")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "TaskAlarmEmulate" or r["_field"] == "TaskMotion" or r["_field"] == "TaskNew")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: L46ERM 定时任务执行占比历史曲线

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu" and  r["_field"] == "usage_idle" and r["cpu"] == "cpu-total" and r["host"] == "DESKTOP-32OGS9I" )
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 100.0 - r._value }))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_iowait")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "experimental"
t1 = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
t3 = from(bucket: "ISC1")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "free")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |>  map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value:60000000000.00 - r._value}))
t2 = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle" and r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value:100.0 - r._value}))

  union(tables: [t1, t2, t3])

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}" and r.name =~ /$disk$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "read_time")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}" and r.name =~ /$disk$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "write_time")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT mean(free) as "free", mean(used) as "used", mean(total) as "total" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "free" or r["_field"] == "used" or r["_field"] == "total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}" and r.name =~ /$disk$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "read_bytes")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}" and r.name =~ /$disk$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "write_bytes")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

title: PLC/IOT硬件信息
